| History                 = The Depanini Family were a Sicilian crime family that were involved in drugs, prostitution, numbers, and extortion. They were trying to carve out a niche in the [[Carbone Crime Family (Earth-616)|Carbone Family]]'s territory in Brooklyn. It's drug smuggling operation in Brooklyn was taken down when the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]], undercover in the Carbone family, led it's men in an assault on their front, a food distribution center. Slaughtering their men and destroying the family's books.{{r|Punisher: War Zone Vol 1 2}}
